title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-2.3 - Assignment to other housing authority projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-2.3 - Assignment to other housing authority projects

State Regulations

An authority may assign site and offsite tenants to
available apartments in other projects it may be operating provided the
probable annual family income of such tenants does not exceed the income limits
for continued occupancy. Such tenants may be transferred to the new project
when it is ready for occupancy, if the tenants so desire. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1626-2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
